# iosxr_macsec_policy (Data Source)

This data source can read the MACSec Policy configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iosxr_macsec_policy" "example" {
  policy_name = "POLICY1"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `policy_name` (String) Enter the policy name of max-length 16

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `allow_lacp_in_clear` (Boolean) Allow LACP((Link aggregation control plane protocol) Packets in clear Text
- `allow_lldp_in_clear` (Boolean) Allow lldp packets in clear text
- `allow_pause_frame_in_clear` (Boolean) Allow pause-frame packets in clear text
- `cipher_suite` (String) Cipher-Suite used for encryption
- `conf_offset` (String) conf-offset used for encryption
- `delay_protection` (Boolean) enable data delay protection
- `enable_legacy_fallback` (Boolean) enable keepalive fallback ca
- `enable_legacy_sak_write` (Boolean) To interop with legacy ncs5500 coherent systems
- `id` (String) The path of the retrieved object.
- `impose_overhead_on_bundle` (Boolean) Impose macsec overhead on bundle interface
- `include_icv_indicator` (Boolean) Include ICV Indicator paramset in MKPDU
- `key_server_priority` (Number) Key Server Priority for the node
- `logging_sak_rekey_disable` (Boolean) disable sak-rekey related syslogs
- `logging_sak_rekey_summary_interval` (Number) Log summary of sak-rekey in syslogs after every specified Interval(in minutes), range(30,43200)
- `max_an` (String) Sets supported AN range from 0 to max-an Default: 3, supported AN 0,1,2,3
- `policy_exception` (String) macsec policy exception to allow packets in clear text
- `ppk` (Boolean) To use PPK supported MACsec session
- `ppk_sks_profile` (String) use sks profile for PPK generation
- `sak_rekey_interval_seconds` (Number) Interval(in seconds)<60-2592000>, Default: OFF
- `security_policy` (String) Must Secure/Should Secure for Data encryption
- `suspend_for_disable` (Boolean) disable MKA suspension when in issu
- `suspend_on_request_disable` (Boolean) disable suspend-on-request from peers in issu
- `use_eapol_pae_in_icv` (Boolean) enable use eapol pae address in icv
- `vlan_tags_in_clear` (Number) Specify the number of vlan-tags in clear (1 or 2)
- `window_size` (Number) window-size used for encryption
